name: @arlula/core
description: JavaScript and TypeScript SDK for the Arlula satellite imagery API

scripts.build-package: npm run clean && npm run compile && node helpers/publishHelper.js
scripts.local-build: npm run build-package && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.test: npm run local-build && cd e2e && rm -rf dist && rm -rf temp  && mkdir temp && npx webpack --env tests && node ./dist/node.js && cd ..
scripts.retest: cd e2e && rm -rf dist && rm -rf temp  && mkdir temp && npx webpack --env tests && node ./dist/node.js && cd ..
